text: Ara jene rakha, yud'dhe ya tomara ganimata hisebe labha karecha, tara eka-pancamansa allah‌ra [1], rasulera, rasulera sbajanadera, iyatimadera, misakinadera ebam sapharakaridera [2] yadi tomara imana rakha allah‌te ebam tate ya mimansara dina amara amadera bandara prati nayila karechilama [3], ye dina du dala parasparera sam'mukhina hayechila. Ara allah‌ sabakichura upara ksamatabana
